name: Relocate
overview: Primary Objectives can be moved by figures, changing the shape of the battlefield in real time.
primary_objectives: Each Primary Objective controlled at the end of the round is worth 2 Victory Points.
secondary_objectives: Each Secondary Objective controlled at the end of the round is worth 1 Victory Point.
special_rules:
All figures gain the following action:
Push (Action): While in base contact with a Primary Objective Marker, move it up to 2" in any direction. Objectives must remain at least 3" from other objectives and terrain features.
